## Carry Recipe
_Secure High Back Carry – Base Size Minus 1 – Traditional Sling Pass + Cross Pass + Reinforcing Pass_

- Traditional Sling Pass over baby on back
- Half knot chestbelt
- Go over open shoulder for Cross Pass
- Other tail goes under arm and across baby for Reinforcing Pass
- Tie in front
